author: Max Fahl
name: Parcel Bootstrapper
description: A simple boilerplate for parcel based web apps using TypeScript and Sass.

scripts.prestart: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R ./src/static dist/static
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R ./src/static dist/static
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build --no-source-maps --out-dir dist --public-url . src/index.html
